mapper.select: SELECT user.*, ((select count(*) from consultation_sheet s where s.user_b_no = user.user_no AND s.`STATUS` != '1') + (select value from yiyn_code where code_type = 'ADVICE_NUM') + user.add_orders) as consultCount, case when t.consultEval is null then 5 else t.consultEval end as consultEval FROM user_b user left join (SELECT round(sum(e.stars)/count(1),1) consultEval,user_b_no FROM consultation_evaluate e group by e.USER_B_NO) t on t.user_b_no = user.user_no where user_no = #{value}

select * from (SELECT user.*, ((select count(1) from consultation_sheet s where s.user_b_no = user.user_no AND s.`STATUS` != '1') + (select value from yiyn_code where code_type = 'ADVICE_NUM') + user.add_orders) as consultCount, case when t.consultEval is null then 5 else t.consultEval end as consultEval FROM user_b user left join (SELECT round(sum(e.stars)/count(1),1) consultEval,user_b_no FROM consultation_evaluate e group by e.USER_B_NO) t on t.user_b_no = user.user_no where RECOMMEND ='Y' and order_set = 2 and is_hidden = 'N') t order by t.consultEval desc,t.consultCount desc,t.advice_val desc

SELECT u.*,case when t.consultEval is null then 5 else t.consultEval end as consultEval FROM user_c_collection c, user_b u left join (SELECT round(sum(e.stars)/count(1),1) consultEval,user_b_no FROM consultation_evaluate e group by e.USER_B_NO) t on t.user_b_no = u.user_no where u.user_no =c.USER_NO_B and c.user_no_c = #{value} and is_hidden = 'N' order by u.ORDER_SET desc,c.CREATED_TIME desc

SELECT user.user_headimg,user.user_name,user.order_set, user.is_hidden,user.advice_val,user.advice_num, case when t.consultEval is null then 5 else t.consultEval end as consultEval, ((select count(*) from consultation_sheet s where s.user_b_no = user.user_no AND s.`STATUS` != '1') + (select value from yiyn_code where code_type = 'ADVICE_NUM') + user.add_orders) as consultCount, (select count(1) from consultation_sheet sheet where sheet.status != '1' and sheet.CREATED_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and sheet.CREATED_TIME < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and sheet.USER_B_NO = user.USER_NO) as advice_num_today FROM user_b user left join (SELECT round(sum(e.stars)/count(1),1) consultEval,user_b_no FROM consultation_evaluate e group by e.USER_B_NO) t on t.user_b_no = user.user_no where user_no = #{value}
